# Environment variables - חשוב! אל תעלה סודות
.env
.env.local
.env.production
.env.development

# API Keys and secrets
credentials.json
secrets/
config/secrets.js

# Node modules
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Build files
dist/
build/
.next/
.nuxt/

# Cache directories
.cache/
.parcel-cache/

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/
.nyc_output

# Dependency directories
jspm_packages/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Logs
logs
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
